WRITING.TITLE: ELI5: I saw a movie and the credits rolled by at almost supersonic speed. Why bother showing them?

WRITING.TEXT: I just bought a 1Ds MKIII - paid about $1200 at an online store. Bought a little better grade and the camera looks brand new. Came with a money back guarantee and a small warranty. Gave me insurance against buyers remorse. Moved up from a T5. Boom - thing is awsome. I can't believe the quality of the pictures. The autofocus is great. I don't need more than 5 frames a second and you probably don't either. Shooting in RAW will slow down any camera. The thing is sexy and a workhorse. A small reason I went to the 1D because of its size (I have huge hands). I am just overwhelmed by the quality of the pictures. I know I'm not going to do movies and the onboard flash was a nuisance to me on the T5, so It doesn't bother me to not have them.
I heard the Easter Bunny hides Eggs because he does not want anyone to know he is having sex with the chickens

I would like to confirm this works. I pay 30 or so for 6 months. The catch is you need to call and renew or cancel before the 6-month mark or you a charged the full price automatically. I just make a calendar reminder. When I call to renew the deal I am aways pushed for a full year. My response is "you can have 5 a month or nothing".
